name: WeepingCat1
desc: I'm weeping cat 1, people took my freedom and force me to play smartphone. Please adopt me and save my life.

name: WeepingCat2
desc: I'm weeping cat 2, I am so boring, so plz adopt me and play with me.

name: WeepingCat3
desc: I'm weeping cat 3, there are some guys want me to eat banana, but I hate it, please adopt me and give me Ice cream.

name: WeepingCat4
desc: I'm weeping cat 4, people are terrible, they want to make a sandwich and eat me, help please.

name: WeepingCat5
desc: I'm weeping cat 5, I'm so lonely, the little bear is all I have, adopt me so I know there always someone accompany whenever I fall asleep.

name: WeepingCat6
desc: I'm weeping cat 6, I don't have money to buy more cute clothes, please adopt me and buy me more cute clothes.

name: WeepingCat7
desc: I'm weeping cat 7, life is sucks, a cup of beer make it easier, but you can share your funny story with me and make life better. What are you waiting for? Click the button.

name: WeepingCat8
desc: I'm weeping cat 8, there are so many things to do, adopt me and set me free.

name: WeepingCat9
desc: I'm weeping cat 9, adopt me and you will have two Shiba too.
